definitions.definition: One who is hired to perform regular household or other duties, and receives compensation . As opposed to a slave .
examples: There are three servants in the household, the butler and two maids.

definitions.definition: One who serves another, providing help in some manner.
examples: She is quite the humble servant , the poor in this city owe much to her but she expects nothing.

definitions.definition: A person who dedicates themselves to God .
A person of low condition or spirit.

main_definition: One who is hired to perform regular household or other duties, and receives compensation . As opposed to a slave .
secondary_definitions: One who serves another, providing help in some manner.
( religion ) A person who dedicates themselves to God .
A person of low condition or spirit.
